TopicTitle: KSP crashing a few minutes- a few seconds after startup.

Articles.Content: Ive been playing KSP on this laptop since i got this thing. I did a mission with SOCK less then a week ago. I saved it for later. On CKAN, I tried installing a couple of mods. I tried loading it up.. Crashed. I tried uninstalling said mods, still crashing. I tried backing up files, didnt help. Can anyone help me with this?
